existing_donor.measure: This project can be funded from existing donors

donor_area.measure: This project will not require building a whole new donor area (i.e.: archeology, contemporary etc.)

foundation_timing.measure: This project will either not require funding from Foundations or fits the timing for a particular foundation

strategic_plan.measure: This project has a strong connection to the Strategic Plan

campus_plan.measure: This project has an existing place on the Campus Master Plan

campaign_priority.measure: This project is included in the Campaign priorities

program_impact.measure: This project does not negatively impact programming (closes galleries etc., reduces capacity, impacts people movement etc.)

legal_obligation.measure: This project satisfies an existing legal obligation

fund_obligation.measure: This project satisfies an existing funding based obligation

completes_cert.measure: This project satisfies an existing Certification

historic_credit.measure: This project is eligible for a historic tax credit

visitation_revenue.measure: This project increases overall visitation (Incremental admissions revenue)

special_ticket.measure: This project supports special ticket sales

other_potential.measure: This project supports special ticket sales

deai_staff.measure: This project requires additional DEAI staff

includes_race.measure: This project includes people from underrepresented races and/or ethnicities

includes_gender.measure: This project includes people with underrepresented gender identities

includes_sexuality.measure: This project includes people with underrepresented sexual identities

includes_physical.measure: This project includes people with physical disabilities

includes_mental.measure: This project includes people with mental disabilities

primary_representation.measure: This project includes primary interpretation (i.e., curator, content contributor) from one or more of the groups described above

secondary_representation.measure: This project includes secondary interpretation (i.e., sources consulted) from one or more of the groups described above

diverse_audience.measure: This project markets to one or more of the groups described above

diverse_support.measure: This project seeks financial support from one or more of the groups described above

diverse_vendor.measure: This project utilizes vendors from one or more of the groups described above

curatorial_staff.measure: This project will not require additional staff

tech.measure: This project will not require enhanced technology or upgrades to WAM’s technological infrastructure

community.measure: This project offers opportunity to collaborate with community partners

academic.measure: This project offers opportunity to collaborate with academic partners

permanent_collection.measure: This project offers a longstanding installation for permanent collection objects

new_donors.measure: This project creates opportunity to build relationships with new donors and collectors

visitor_experience.measure: This project improves the overall visitor experience

collection_strength.measure: This project improves the visibility and accessibility of a particular area of strength within WAM’s collection

storage_turnover.measure: This project provides opportunity to bring objects out of storage

conservation_opportunity.measure: This project provides opportunity for objects to receive conservation treatment

interpretive_update.measure: This project provides opportunity to update interpretive content

enhance_display.measure: This project provides opportunity to enhance the display of objects in a gallery (safety, aesthetic)

steward.measure: This project provides opportunity to better steward WAM’s collection

code_law_regulation.measure: This project satisfies a requirement outlined by code, law, or regulation

art_environment.measure: This project will provide an opportunity to improve environmental systems where art is housed

hvac_art.measure: This project will provide an opportunity for repairs to the envelop, cooling and heating systems where art is affected

hvac_nonart.measure: This project will provide an opportunity for repairs to the envelop, cooling and heating systems where art is not affected

service_improvement.measure: This project will improve customer service

efficient_process.measure: This project will improve efficiency of work processes

public_aesthetics.measure: This project will improve aesthetics of public areas

nonpublic_aesthetics.measure: This project will improve aesthetics of nonpublic areas

education_staff.measure: This project does not require additional Ed/Exp staff and volunteers

program_enhancement.measure: This project enhances events, programs, and classes

curricular_connection.measure: This project increases curricular connections for K-12 schools and colleges

accessible.measure: This project improves physical and interpretive accessibility

view_variety.measure: This project broadens variety and number of objects on view

existing_community.measure: This project strengthens existing community relationships

new_community.measure: This project creates new community partnerships

education_market.measure: This project fits well into Education marketing channels

storage_capacity.measure: This project will positively impact storage capacity

collections_access.measure: This project will positively impact access to collections in storage

site_storage.measure: This project will not require additional off-site storage

swing_space.measure: This project will not require closure of galleries for swing space/storage of displaced material

add_storage.measure: This project will free up/ give additional storage space

positive_impact.measure: This project will positively impact collection management

inventory.measure: This project will enable an inventory to take place, improve object records, produce new photography for security, or enable checking

av_staff.measure: This project will not require additional staff due to addition of interactives in the galleries (AV, IT, Additional Preparators)

current_collection.measure: The current collection can support the project or subsequent programming

loan_embargo.measure: This project will not require an embargo on outgoing or incoming loans

acquisitions_embargo.measure: This project will not require an embargo on acquisitions

resource_conflict.measure: This project will not cause a conflict of resources (staff, galleries, storage, other sorts of locations)
